So when progressives call for a convention, they are giving credence to the idea of holding one. They are saying “sure, let’s open that document up” to an unelected body for changes. They are helping the Koch brothers & Mercers spread the idea that a convention is a good idea.

They want a balanced budget amendment - and many other things that are even worse like letting states overturn federal protections. That would probably mean saying goodbye to Roe, marriage equality, Medicaid, the EPA, and the Voting Rights Act, among many other things.

Calling an Article V Convention to overturn Citizens United, or for any progressive issue, is a really bad idea right now. For starters, well-funded far-right special interest orgs like @ALEC_states & @COSProject are just a few states away from calling their own convention.
